abstract.para: This is reference documentation for all user-configurable parameters in the DocBook XSL Slides FO stylesheet (for generating PDF slide presentations). Note that the Slides stylesheet for FO output is a customization layer of the DocBook XSL FO stylesheet. Therefore, in addition to the slides-specific parameters listed in this section, you can also use a number of FO stylesheet parameters to control Slides FO output.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies font family to use for slide titles

refsection.para: Specifies the font family to use for slides titles.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies font family to use for slide bodies

refsection.para: Specifies the font family to use for slides bodies.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies unitless font size to use for foil titles

refsynopsisdiv.programlisting: <xsl:param name="foil.title.master">36</xsl:param> <!-- Inconsistant use of point size? -->

refsection.para: Specifies a unitless font size to use for foil titles; used in combination with the foil.title.size parameter.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies font size to use for foil titles, including units

refsection.para: This parameter combines the value of the foil.title.master parameter with a unit specification. The default unit is pt (points).
This parameter specifies properties that are applied to all slides.
This parameter specifies properties that are applied to all foilgroups.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies properties for all foil subtitles

refsynopsisdiv.programlisting: <xsl:attribute-set name="foil.subtitle.properties"> <xsl:attribute name="font-family"> <xsl:value-of select="$slide.title.font.family"></xsl:value-of> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="text-align">center</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="font-size"> <xsl:value-of select="$foil.title.master * 0.8"></xsl:value-of><xsl:text>pt</xsl:text> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="space-after">12pt</xsl:attribute> </xsl:attribute-set>

refsection.para: This parameter specifies properties that are applied to all foil subtitles.
This parameter specifies properties that are applied to all foils.

refsynopsisdiv.programlisting: <xsl:attribute-set name="speakernote.properties"> <xsl:attribute name="font-family">Times Roman</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="font-style">italic</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="font-size">12pt</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="font-weight">normal</xsl:attribute> </xsl:attribute-set>

refsection.para: This parameter specifies properties that are applied to all speakernotes.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies properties for running foot on each slide

refsection.para: This parameter specifies properties that are applied to the running foot area of each slide.
